message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $105 is my absolute minimum. Would you be willing to meet me there?

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $105, so I'll offer $100. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
